original_text: You bad sheep make sure that you have plenty of good grass to eat. But then you spoil the other grass so that no other sheep can eat it. You have clean water to drink. But then you spoil the water which remains. It is too dirty for other sheep to drink.
korean_text: 너희가 좋은 꼴을 먹는 것을 작은 일로 여기느냐 어찌하여 남은 꼴을 발로 밟았느냐 너희가 맑은 물을 마시는 것을 작은 일로 여기느냐 어찌하여 남은 물을 발로 더럽혔느냐

sentences.original_text: make sure that you have plenty of good grass to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 먹을 좋은 풀이 풍부하게 있는지 확인하라

sentences.original_text: But then you spoil the other grass
so that no other sheep can eat it
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다른 양들이 그것을 먹을 수 없게 된다

sentences.original_text: You have clean water to drink
But then you spoil the water which remains
It is too dirty for other sheep to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 양들이 마시기에는 너무 더럽다
